name: 曾柏軒
objective:
本課程著重於統計信號處理的理論，涵蓋下列主題：
1. 隨機程序之複習
2. Maximum Likelihood 估計
3. Least Squares 估計
4. Minimum Mean Square Error (MMSE) 估計
5. Maximum A Posteriori (MAP) 估計
6. Neyman Pearson 偵測
7. Bayesian 偵測
將著重在無線通訊通道估計、訊號偵測的問題，探討如何應用偵測與估計的理論。
schedule:
1. Classical Estimation
a. Minimum Variance Unbiased Estimator
b. Cramer-Rao Lower Bound
c. Maximum Likelihood Estimator
d. Least Squares Estimator
2. Bayesian Estimation
a. Minimum Mean Square Error Estimation
b. Maximum A Posteriori Estimation
3. Detection
a. Neyman Pearson Detection
b. Composite Hypothesis Testing
scorePolicy:
期中考 30%
作業 30%: Matlab 程式模擬
期末報告 40%: 以偵測與估計為主題的研究議題報告
materials:
教科書
1. Steven M. Kay, Fundamentals of Statistical Signal Processing: Estimation Theory (Vol I)
2. Steven M. Kay, Fundamentals of Statistical Signal Processing: Detection Theory (Vol II) 
3. Steven M. Kay, Fundamentals of Statistical Signal Processing: Practical Algorithm Development (Vol III) 

參考書
H. Vincent Poor, An Introduction to Signal Detection and Estimation
